__TOC__

=== Use case ===
* User wants to follow a class but don't care about the chatroom, browser, slide and widget.
* User have multiple screens and whats to have the classroom on a seperate screen.

=== Implementation ===

'''Detaching widget''': When right clicking a widget (e.g., classroom, slide etc.) a menu will pop up where the user can select to detach the widget and the widget will then get its own window, which the user can move around freely.

'''Attaching widget''': In the main window, a button will take the widgets place and when clicked the widget will attach itself the main window again. Closing the widgets window will also reattach it.
